text: The Museum of Aeronautical Science (航空科学博物館) is an aviation museum located in Shibayama, Chiba prefecture, Japan. It is near Narita International Airport. It opened in 1989.Wada, Yuhei The high altitudes of airplane aesthetics February 25, 2011 Japan Times Retrieved September 8, 2016 ==Outdoor display area== NAMC YS-11 and other aircraft on display * Cessna 195 * Mitsubishi MU-2 * Fuji/Rockwell Commander 700 * NAMC YS-11 * Sikorsky S-62 * Kamov Ka-26 * Cessna 411 * Beechcraft Bonanza * Learjet * Aero Commander 680 * Robinson R22 * Cessna 175 ==References== ==External links== * Museum of Aeronautical Sciences * Museum of Aeronautical Science – Narita City Sightseeing Guide * Airport Spotting - Museum of Aeronautical Science, Narita, Japan Category:History museums in Japan Category:Aerospace museums in Japan
title: Museum of Aeronautical Science
